扣.definition: to fasten; to button; button; buckle; knot; to arrest; to confiscate; to deduct (money); discount; to knock; to smash, spike or dunk (a ball); to cover (with a bowl etc); (fig.) to tag a label on sb; (Tw) (loanword) code

扣人心弦.definition: to excite; to thrill; exciting; thrilling; cliff-hanging

扣住.definition: to detain; to hold back by force; to buckle; to hook

扣分.definition: to deduct marks (when grading school work); to have marks deducted; penalty points; to lose points for a penalty or error

扣壓.definition: to withhold; to hold sth back (and prevent it being known)

扣屎盆子.definition: to make a scapegoat of sb; to defame; to slander

扣屎盔子.definition: (northern dialect) lit. to cap in excrement; fig. to discredit with absurd unfounded accusations; to vilify

扣帽子.definition: to tag sb with unfair label; power word

扣應.definition: to call in (to a broadcast program) (loanword) (Tw)

扣押.definition: to detain; to hold in custody; to distrain; to seize property

扣殺.definition: to smash a ball; to spike

扣球.definition: to smash a ball; to spike

扣環.definition: circlip; C-clip; snap ring; Jesus clip; brooch

扣留.definition: to detain; to arrest; to hold; to confiscate

扣發.definition: to deprive; to withhold; to hold sth back (and prevent it being known)

扣關.definition: variant of 叩關|叩关[kou4 guan1]
